channel.title: How to download off a website?
channel.description: I was looking around and i couldnt find anyting but...how would i download something off of a website? say the runescape jar and loader.jar?

item.title: How to download off a website?
item.dc:creator: @RLN RLN
item.description:
@RLN wrote:

private void download(String url, File file) { byte[] buffer = new byte[8192]; try { URL u = new URL(url); URLConnection uc = u.openConnection(); InputStream in = uc.getInputStream(); FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(file); int c = 0, len = uc.getContentLength(), read = 0; while(read < len) { c = in.read(buffer); read += c; out.write(buffer, 0, c); } in.close(); out.close(); } catch (Exception _ex) { _ex.printStackTrace(); } }

Read full topic
item.source: How to download off a website?

item.title: How to download off a website?
item.dc:creator: @Avalanche Avalanche
item.description:
@Avalanche wrote:

Is this right?

class main() { File f = new File("runescape.jar"); } public static void main(String args[]) { System.out.println("Downloading runescape jar..."); download(url + "/runescape.jar", f); } } private void download(String url, File out) throws IOException { URL u = new URL("http://ny14.runescape.com/runescape.jar"); URLConnection uc = u.openConnection(); InputStream is = uc.getInputStream(); FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(out); is.close(); fos.close(); } } }

Read full topic
